definition: capable of moving or bending freely, specifically referring to persons' bodies, make pliant and flexible
details:
adjective
- capable of moving or bending freely, specifically referring to persons' bodies
= example: capable of moving or bending freely, specifically referring to persons' bodies
= synonyms: limber
- (used of e.g. personality traits) readily adaptable
= example: (used of e.g. personality traits) readily adaptable
= synonyms: limber
- moving and bending with ease
= synonyms: slender
verb
- make pliant and flexible
= example: make pliant and flexible
